revision.comment: Created page with "== Overview == The DAP2 INFO service provides a browser renderable page that combines both the DAP2 'syntactic' and 'semantic' metadata for the data resource in a human readabl..."
revision.text: == Overview == The DAP2 INFO service provides a browser renderable page that combines both the DAP2 'syntactic' and 'semantic' metadata for the data resource in a human readable way. == Request == The DAP2 INFO Service is invoked by appending the suffix .info to the file part of the dataset's referent (aka base) URL and then dereferencing the new URL. The INFO service ignores a query string (constraint expression). Need links to DAP2 spec bla blah blah == Response == The DAP2 INFO response returns a web browser renderable document that combines both the DAP2 'syntactic' and 'semantic' metadata for the data resource in a human readable way. Need links to DAP2 spec bla blah blah == Errors == [[DAP2:_Responses#Error_Response | DAP2: Error Response]] [[Category:Development|Development]][[Category:DAP4|DAP4]]
